storyInfo: The army and Maylander fight over the Vice President inside and outside Rhine. Ferdinand is clearly planning something in the vast underground space.

attributes.content: Hurry! All the headlines will be the Vice President's visit to Rhine tomorrow. The editor-in-chief will have our heads if we don't get a good photo.
attributes.name: Reporter A

attributes.content: Wait, I can't find my press pass...
attributes.name: Reporter B

attributes.content: What? You can't go in without it!
attributes.name: Reporter A

attributes.content: Go find a good spot! I'll look for it.
attributes.name: Reporter B

attributes.content: So many people...
attributes.name: Rhine Staff A

attributes.content: I couldn't even get to the caf√© downstairs for breakfast.
attributes.name: Rhine Staff A

attributes.content: A public visit by the Vice President, broadcasted live. Every newspaper is here. It's a wonder they didn't completely block the roads.
attributes.name: Rhine Staff B

attributes.content: You see it, Rosmontis?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: First the factory, then Rhine Lab. Trimounts likes to block off a place when something happens.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Rhine Lab is different from the factory, isn't it? They blocked off some of the key roads leading in. Probably out of security concerns for the Vice President's convoy.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Which causes other streets to fill up.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Did they think people wouldn't see if they blocked it off? That's dumb.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: ...Mm-hm.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Doctor, what are you looking at?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Sunny all day long! The hotel TV had the weather report on when were leaving. Guess you didn't see it.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Anyway, it's not the rainy season yet.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Another sunny day.

The urban planning of Trimounts is intricate, the gaps between the staggered skyscrapers allowing sunlight to pass through, for the sun to paint each street with warm light evenly in these early days of winter.
You look up to see a dark cloud in the distance, floating nonchalantly in the sky. The wind is blowing toward the cloud, and it looks to be moving away from the city.
But it never disappears.
You also see the busy streets, the parked cars, a flash of light up high in the distance, and well-disguised 'passersby'...
You keep a poker face while urging the two girls on.
Did you find something, Doctor?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.options: Could be Maylander Foundation spies.;Could be army operatives.;Let's go. Muelsyse is waiting.

attributes.content: Don't worry, Doctor, we'll protect you.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: I know, I know. You've said it a dozen times before we left.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: I promised to listen to you, and I keep my promises.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: I think we're there.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Dr. {@nickname}. We meet again.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: As usual, I'm the one waiting.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.options: I'm not late.;......;I'm a minute early.

attributes.content: Ah, well, I got here before you. I got myself ready as soon as your message came in.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.options: This is your company, after all...

attributes.content: Well, this is what you asked for... plans for the Rhine Lab building, and visitor's passes for you and your young assistants.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: I called in a few favors to get you clearance to most of the building and data. Today only.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: There are lots of hidden spaces in the building, both above and below ground. My tip is to have someone focus on the underground.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: I have to accompany Mr. Vice President on his Rhine tour, of course.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Kristen's not here, and we're missing a few section heads. Can't have anyone else calling out.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: I'll give you a big, personal thank you when we're all done.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.options: It's always clones...;You may be on your own, Ifrit.

attributes.content: I read your resignation letter, Bieber. Why so sudden?
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: I'm sorry, Director Jara.
attributes.name: Energy Section Researcher

attributes.content: I discovered something yesterday.
attributes.name: Energy Section Researcher

attributes.content: Go on.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: Energy's wing has 38 ceiling lamps and 21 vents.
attributes.name: Energy Section Researcher

attributes.content: The carpet beneath our feet looks the same at first glance, but a closer look reveals that there are actually three versions, subtly different in pattern and fringes.
attributes.name: Energy Section Researcher

attributes.content: I didn't know you were planning to go into interior design, Bieber.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: You would've done the same if all the projects you're involved in are up in the air, and the only work you have to do each day is to re-read the report that you wrote the day before.
attributes.name: Energy Section Researcher

attributes.content: I understand. It's hard work, keeping your guys calm while pretending that everything is business as usual.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: I could live with hard work, Director.
attributes.name: Energy Section Researcher

attributes.content: The labs have always been relatively independent of one another, and research is modular. Everybody goes about their own business, even if something happens to Site 359, even if Ferdinand quits unexpectedly.
attributes.name: Energy Section Researcher

attributes.content: At the lower levels, people don't know much and believe this is no different from any number of 'research accidents' that have happened before, the kind that every tech company deals with every now and then.
attributes.name: Energy Section Researcher

attributes.content: But I know this one is different...
attributes.name: Energy Section Researcher

attributes.content: Control has virtually vanished without a trace, and Ferdinand suddenly resigned. Every day is like sitting on a fire. There's been no formal change of leadership in Energy, no one to tell me what happened, or what I should do.
attributes.name: Energy Section Researcher

attributes.content: Now the Vice President is touring Rhine. It makes my stomach seize up when I walk into the lab and see the excitement in everybody's eyes.
attributes.name: Energy Section Researcher

attributes.content: So you talked to Volvort Kochinski's headhunter... Sonya, right?
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: I... yes.
attributes.name: Energy Section Researcher

attributes.content: I'm not reprimanding you, Bieber.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: Your position at Rhine Lab allows you to see more than the average employee, but not the full picture. It's normal to feel anxious.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: The responsibility falls on me. I asked you to keep things calm in the Energy Section, but neglected your own emotional needs.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: I-It's not your fault. Just weakness on my part...
attributes.name: Energy Section Researcher

attributes.content: Why do you think the Vice President is making this sudden visit?
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: I... I don't know. But he'll find out that we're...
attributes.name: Energy Section Researcher

attributes.content: The press conference that he held a few days ago has to do with us.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: ...Really?
attributes.name: Energy Section Researcher

attributes.content: That's all I can tell you for now.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: How about this? Take one month off. Paid leave. Maybe it'll be enough for you to clear your head and return to your post.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: If you still insist on resigning after that, I won't stop you.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: Rhine Lab grew from a single lab to ten sections, running more than a hundred large-scale projects simultaneously. It has seen bigger storms.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: It has survived them all.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: Just give it a little thought.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: Sorry for the trouble, Sonya.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: The staff need a way to vent in times like this.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: Bieber should be the last one. If he's okay, the Energy Section is okay for now.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: Yeah, catch you for lunch or dinner one of these days. Give Tin Man my thanks.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: *sigh*...
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: Come in.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: How many does that make this week?
attributes.name: Justin Jr.

attributes.content: Not your problem.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: Just don't send them to Business if you're reassigning them. I don't need flighty idiots like that.
attributes.name: Justin Jr.

attributes.content: They're cornerstones of this company, Justin, just as you are.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: And I may be old, but I'm not senile enough to assign a PhD in Energy Mechanics to be one of your salesmen.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: The Vice President is almost here. I doubt you have the time to fool around in my office.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: Just giving you a heads-up. I'm seeing a few new investors today, and I have a number of important remote meetings to attend.
attributes.name: Justin Jr.

attributes.content: Since the Vice President is here to inspect research, I'll excuse myself.
attributes.name: Justin Jr.

attributes.content: None of the phones in Business stopped ringing the day the Vice President announced his visit to Rhine. I had to get someone to add two dedicated hotlines.
attributes.name: Justin Jr.

attributes.content: It's a clear signal. The world of Trimountian finance...
attributes.name: Justin Jr.

attributes.content: No, not just Trimounts, not just finance. Every Columbian who even has a passing interest in investing has their eyes on us.
attributes.name: Justin Jr.

attributes.content: That Bieber has a lot of stock options, doesn't he? I say you just accept his resignation, then hire him back at a lower salary when the company's stock soars and he begs for it.
attributes.name: Justin Jr.

attributes.content: Rhine Lab is not a stock market toy, Justin.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: Now that is hurtful.
attributes.name: Justin Jr.

attributes.content: Mayor Benjamin, Councilman Chris, Deputy Phil, Commander Colette, even the Chief Justice... that's just a few of the people I'm talking to today.
attributes.name: Justin Jr.

attributes.content: Could Kristen have kept playing her hide-and-seek game with Blake if I hadn't continued to sweet-talk all these friends?
attributes.name: Justin Jr.

attributes.content: You utilized a lot of resources...
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: Just doing my job.
attributes.name: Justin Jr.

attributes.content: And one correction... I'm not a cornerstone of Rhine Lab.
attributes.name: Justin Jr.

attributes.content: A cornerstone exists for other people to build upon.
attributes.name: Justin Jr.

attributes.content: I don't have the same loyalty to Kristen as you do. I chose her and Rhine.
attributes.name: Justin Jr.

attributes.content: I helped her because I wanted to take control of my own fate, of everyone's fates.
attributes.name: Justin Jr.

attributes.content: This isn't a game.
attributes.name: Justin Jr.

attributes.content: News from Maylander?
attributes.name: Jackson

attributes.content: Yes, sir. They have personnel deployed around the area to ensure your safety.
attributes.name: Vice President's Secretary

attributes.content: Good. How much further?
attributes.name: Jackson

attributes.content: Two more blocks until Rhine Lab headquarters.
attributes.name: Vice President's Secretary

attributes.content: Canceling today's tour is always an option, sir, if you're concerned.
attributes.name: Vice President's Secretary

attributes.content: If the Maylander Foundation can't be trusted, then canceling the tour won't be enough to protect me.
attributes.name: Jackson

attributes.content: I can't very well skip class to see the mining platforms chase the sun because I'm scared of exams, like I did when I was young.
attributes.name: Jackson

attributes.content: Not when I'm the Vice President of the Columbia Union.
attributes.name: Jackson

attributes.content: You should get some rest while you can, sir. I doubt there will be many more chances today.
attributes.name: Vice President's Secretary

attributes.content: Do you remember how I described Trimounts at yesterday's banquet?
attributes.name: Jackson

attributes.content: 'The future of Columbia.' You said you love this youthful city, just as you love this youthful nation.
attributes.name: Vice President's Secretary

attributes.content: As a matter of fact, I don't like this place at all.
attributes.name: Jackson

attributes.content: There are no burdenbeasts, no clouds of dust kicked up by their hooves, no duels for some 'dumb' reason, no pioneering spirit.
attributes.name: Jackson

attributes.content: Only white-collar workers and their coffee, high-rise buildings that split the sky, and... *sniff* air so clean it makes your stomach squirm.
attributes.name: Jackson

attributes.content: I believe the Trimountian circulation system employs‚Äî
attributes.name: Vice President's Secretary

attributes.content: Don't, Pavard. I'll be hearing far too many explanations like that over the next few hours.
attributes.name: Jackson

attributes.content: You don't like dealing with scientists?
attributes.name: Vice President's Secretary

attributes.content: I won't go that far.
attributes.name: Jackson

attributes.content: They're simple. They can go on and on about their products, blueprints or ideals, sometimes outlandish, sometimes crazy, mostly incomprehensible...
attributes.name: Jackson

attributes.content: All I need to do is smile, nod, and shake their hands when they're done, giving them a few words of encouragement.
attributes.name: Jackson

attributes.content: Much simpler than dealing with the old folks of the special district.
attributes.name: Jackson

attributes.content: You represent the state. The people like to see Columbia support science. It's good for your image, and your odds in the next election.
attributes.name: Vice President's Secretary

attributes.content: The vice presidential election, Columbia's biggest political event... but I'm thinking that perhaps I shouldn't spend too much time and effort on it.
attributes.name: Jackson

attributes.content: You've achieved a lot in the past several years. The polls indicate you enjoy a high level of support...
attributes.name: Vice President's Secretary

attributes.content: The representatives who support you have also been in contact with that influential Vulpo director of Rhine Lab. It's not easy to gain the support of big tech. You have a head start.
attributes.name: Vice President's Secretary

attributes.content: No, I meant in comparison with Mark Max, the President ever guiding Columbia to her promised future.
attributes.name: Jackson

attributes.content: All that national attention surrounding the vice presidential elections just adds to the embarrassment.
attributes.name: Jackson

attributes.content: What is this screen showing?
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: The cargo passageway behind Rhine Lab.
attributes.name: Columbian Soldier

attributes.content: A little to the left. Zoom in... good, now there shouldn't be any dead zones.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: The soldier is nervous as he operates the equipment. The Colonel has been standing behind him for some time now, his brow furrowed.
The five blocks around Rhine Lab headquarters have all been placed under surveillance.
Many figures are moving on the screens. Key areas have been blocked off, but there continues to be a considerable crowd nearby.
Of course, the crowd also provides good cover for their operations.
The soldier scans each monitor, not daring to even blink.
What's the situation on the ground?
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: All undercover and support units are in position.
attributes.name: Columbian Soldier

attributes.content: Good.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: Where is Ferdinand?
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: He's on the phone.
attributes.name: Columbian Soldier

attributes.content: The phone?
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: Yes. Should I summon him?
attributes.name: Columbian Soldier

attributes.content: Never mind, no need to tell him.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: What about the colleagues in the Defense Section that he talked about?
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: We've 'taken over.'
attributes.name: Columbian Soldier

attributes.content: Good.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: A shadow flashes across the display on the bottom-left, before appearing on the other screens. It is the Columbia displayed on top of a car.
Several black vehicles maintain equal separation with it, both in front and behind, with machine-like discipline.
Begin.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: The Vice President's convoy is in sight. Begin.
attributes.name: Columbian Soldier

attributes.content: Have a nice tour, Jackson.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: Mr. Vice President! There have been reports that Triton factory explosion in District 13 was linked to Rhine Lab.
attributes.name: Reporter

attributes.content: Is your visit to Rhine Lab at this time intended to dispel such speculation?
attributes.name: Reporter

attributes.content: Excuse me.
attributes.name: Reporter?

attributes.content: District 13 is still under lockdown. Did you authorize the army's actions, and how long will the lockdown remain in effect?
attributes.name: Reporter

attributes.content: Will you be meeting with Control Wright?
attributes.name: Reporter

attributes.content: Excuse me... Mr. Vice President, about your schedule in Trimounts...
attributes.name: Reporter?

attributes.content: Patience, please.
attributes.name: Rhine Staff

attributes.content: There will be a press conference after the Vice President has concluded his tour.
attributes.name: Rhine Staff

attributes.content: We have set aside a space to accommodate members of the press. Please, follow me, and refrain from disturbing other staff members in their work.
attributes.name: Rhine Staff

attributes.content: There's no one else?
attributes.name: Reporter?

attributes.content: Damn!
attributes.name: Reporter?

attributes.content: Shut him up.
attributes.name: Rhine Staff?

attributes.content: Mmph‚Äî
attributes.name: Reporter?

attributes.content: Look at that, hiding weapons in recording equipment. Search him and make sure he doesn't have anything else on him.
attributes.name: Rhine Staff?

attributes.content: There's a discrepancy in the documents... find a way to check the credentials of all the reporters in the press area. Be discreet.
attributes.name: Rhine Staff?

attributes.content: I got this one. No commotion.
attributes.name: Rhine Staff?

attributes.content: Lost contact with A1, A2 A3...
attributes.name: Sniper

attributes.content: Have all our locations been compromised?!
attributes.name: Sniper

attributes.content: HQ, HQ, need immediate instruction on whether to continue operation‚Äî
attributes.name: Sniper

attributes.content: Grgh...
attributes.name: Sniper

attributes.content: That's the 9th one.
attributes.name: Citizen?

attributes.content: If you're used to dealing with terrorists, you know a thing or two about planning a terror attack.
attributes.name: Citizen?

attributes.content: Report.
attributes.name: Tin Man

attributes.content: All potential vantage points within sniping range of Rhine Lab have been secured.
attributes.name: Citizen?

attributes.content: We have neutralized nine snipers and eleven disguised assassins.
attributes.name: Citizen?

attributes.content: Continue to monitor the area around Rhine Lab. Roads, vehicles, pedestrians... leave no stone unturned.
attributes.name: Tin Man

attributes.content: Roger.
attributes.name: Citizen?

attributes.content: The Vice President has entered the Rhine building. It will be difficult for us to deploy directly inside the building. Do you intend to be on scene personally?
attributes.name: Citizen?

attributes.content: I got a message from a colleague. There's somewhere else that I need to be.
attributes.name: Tin Man

attributes.content: Share intel with Dr. {@nickname} of Rhodes Island. Follow any orders issued by the Doctor.
attributes.name: Tin Man

attributes.content: Acknowledged.
attributes.name: Citizen?

attributes.content: This one makes seven.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Just mass-produced power armor, Doctor.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Don't worry, it won't take too much effort.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: The serial numbers match the ones that the Defense Section lost, but five are still unaccounted for.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Should we keep looking? We need to eliminate them before they leave the secret passage, right?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: They'll cause chaos if they get out, even if they can't get to the Vice President.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: How did you think of using the access permissions granted by Muelsyse to check the Defense Section's equipment log?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.options: Just going down the list of possible options. I didn't expect to strike gold on the first try.;I didn't think the assassins would throw acid at the Vice President disguised as researchers.

attributes.content: I see.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.options: Something feels off. These mechs seem cautious in their movements.
It doesn't seem so much an assassination attempt as...

attributes.content: Movement, Doctor.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: No. Who could be in a secret passage at this hour...?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Doctor, Operator Rosmontis... what are you doing here?
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: I see... sorry, Doctor, I've been maintaining radio silence because I had infiltrated Rhine to retrieve data for Kal'tsit.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: As for Kal'tsit's whereabouts, I have no idea either.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: The remaining power armor...
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: I destroyed five before running into you and the Doctor. That makes a total of twelve, which matches the number that the Defense Section lost.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: And so, I went to find someone.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: I'm guessing the feeling of being dragged out of a suit of power armor is not something you want to experience again, Reggie.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: What orders did Ferdinand give you?
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: He only wanted to borrow a few suits of power armor.
attributes.name: Defense Section Employee

attributes.content: Ferdinand can't be trusted.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: What about you?
attributes.name: Defense Section Employee

attributes.content: How do I trust someone who repeatedly ignores the rules that she set, showing up at Rhine whenever she wants, who abandoned all her responsibilities?
attributes.name: Defense Section Employee

attributes.content: He took over Defense when you left. He paid our wages for the past few years.
attributes.name: Defense Section Employee

attributes.content: He remembers our names, our hobbies, even gives us gifts, every once in a while.
attributes.name: Defense Section Employee

attributes.content: Ferdinand may have been an asshole.
attributes.name: Defense Section Employee

attributes.content: But I have to say, Director Saria‚Äî
attributes.name: Defense Section Employee

attributes.content: That asshole paid our bills.
attributes.name: Defense Section Employee

attributes.content: The Vice President is still inside Rhine. You know the consequences if something happens.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: We must check everything that Ferdinand may have touched.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Just the ten suits of power armor. You have my word.
attributes.name: Defense Section Employee

attributes.content: I destroyed seven, Saria destroyed five...
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: That's impossible!
attributes.name: Defense Section Employee

attributes.content: Ferdinand only borrowed ten. I watched him enter the commands myself!
attributes.name: Defense Section Employee

attributes.options: What kind of man is Ferdinand, Saria?

attributes.content: Proud, arrogant, thinks himself better than everyone else.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: But if there's one thing that sets him above other people...
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: It's that he actually puts his boasts into action.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.options: I don't think those ten mechs are for assassinating the Vice President.

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.options: As for the two extra ones...;Looks like he and the army are on guard against each other.;Ferdinand doesn't want the Vice President assassinated at Rhine Lab.
